businessProfile.name: Perinton Pizza Emporium
businessProfile.address: 7374 Pittsford Palmyra Rd, Fairport, NY 14450, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 7374 Pittsford Palmyra Rd, Fairport, NY 14450, USA

reviews.text: We‚Äôve been customers of Perinton Pizza for years and my daughter requested they cater her graduation party. Can‚Äôt say enough good things about our experience. Top notch customer service from start to finish with absolutely amazing food everyone was asking who catered!  Love our standby pizza, but if you need catering, this is the place to go!  Unfortunately, too busy to get pictures, but we had arancini, artichoke French, penne marinara, chicken parm, fruit salad and chicken broccoli alfredo and they were all hits!!   Thank you to Kevin and all of the staff for such an easy and seamless experience to cater our party!!

1st time. Pick up order. Place is cute with its checkered tables. Heard a lot about this place from co worker's and it did NOT disappoint. The pizza üçï was so good. The crust was very good. The sauce had a slightly sweet taste which I loved. Toppings were plentiful. Wings were meaty and cooked perfectly.  Steak sub was delicious.  Roll super fresh. You can tell they put a lot of love into their cooking especially with seasonings. Definitely NOT your average pizza place. This will be our new favorite.  Customer service was great too. Don't hesitate to come to this establishment. You'll find out what you've been missing!

I used to come here often as a young girl. Tonight I got a large pepperoni pizza & another (large) 3 topping pizza where they advertise $10.88 pizza‚Äôs on Tuesday‚Äôs. I ended up paying $53 for the pizza‚Äôs & an order of chicken fingers and fries. The crust is nice & crispy the undercarriage is a lil limp but the red sauce makes up for it. I also got an order of chicken fingers & French fries (fries come salted, if that matters to some) that came out perfectly. The chicken fingers were perfect, crispy & paired nicely w/ the classic boss sauce. Very friendly staff just how I remembered it. Definitely will be back again to try more things on their HUGE menu they have. They also have very good daily deals, check them out if you haven‚Äôt already!

Always had great food from them until August 30th, when I was given a pizza with multiple hairs baked into the cheese, and overcooked french fries. I was promised my money back and a meal on them, but still have not received anything, and the manager that I talked to was angry that I was complaining about the food. I ended up ordering my family dinner from TK's, which never disappoints. I will never be ordering from Perinton Pizza Emporium ever again, we don't like hairy, overcooked food, or rude workers.

We had a college graduation party for our son yesterday, and we chose Perinton Pizza Emporium to cater our event.  We had two sheet pizzas, gluten free pizza, ricotta gnocchi in vodka sauce, chicken french, italian meatballs in Su day sauce, Italian sausage with peppers and onions, and salad.  Everyone raved about how delicious the food was and asked us for the name of the caterer.  The food arrived early, warm and I must agree that everything was delicious.  The staff of this family owned restaurant  was very warm, friendly and easy to work with.  It was a great experience and we will definitely use them again!  If you want a taste of Italy, I recommend you visit them for dinner or use them to cater your next party.  You won't be disappointed!

editorial_summary.overview: Long-running, casual spot for wings, subs & a variety of specialty pizzas, including BBQ chicken.

recentReviews.text: Ordered pizza and wings for dinner. Both were phenomenal! Highly recommend.
Our favorite pizzeria!!! They are consistent‚Ä¶. We‚Äôve never had a bad pizza!
Great pizza, consistent, I called and they added me to their delivery area, wish I did it sooner!!! Great food
Best pizza in Rochester!  HUGE wings too!
Outstanding customer service!  Great people!  Huge portions!  These guys know what they're doing!  Highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Yoder
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pizza and wings for dinner. Both were phenomenal! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Christopher
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite pizzeria!!! They are consistent‚Ä¶. We‚Äôve never had a bad pizza!

detailedReviews.author: roman napora
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, consistent, I called and they added me to their delivery area, wish I did it sooner!!! Great food

detailedReviews.author: Lauren : Rank Rise Studio
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza üçï and staff

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Wroblewski
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Rochester!  HUGE wings too!

detailedReviews.author: Kenneth King
detailedReviews.text: Outstanding customer service!  Great people!  Huge portions!  These guys know what they're doing!  Highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Matt Ebersold
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been customers of Perinton Pizza for years and my daughter requested they cater her graduation party. Can‚Äôt say enough good things about our experience. Thank you to Kevin and all of the staff for such an easy and seamless experience to cater our party!!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Bradley
detailedReviews.text: 1st time. Pick up order. Place is cute with its checkered tables. Heard a lot about this place from co worker's and it did NOT disappoint. The pizza üçï was so good. Don't hesitate to come to this establishment. You'll find out what you've been missing!

detailedReviews.text: I used to come here often as a young girl. Tonight I got a large pepperoni pizza & another (large) 3 topping pizza where they advertise $10.88 pizza‚Äôs on Tuesday‚Äôs. detailedReviews.author: Luca Gelli
detailedReviews.text: Best in Rochester. Hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Neal G
detailedReviews.text: We had a college graduation party for our son yesterday, and we chose Perinton Pizza Emporium to cater our event.  We had two sheet pizzas, gluten free pizza, ricotta gnocchi in vodka sauce, chicken french, italian meatballs in Su day sauce, Italian sausage with peppers and onions, and salad.  Everyone raved about how delicious the food was and asked us for the name of the caterer.  The food arrived early, warm and I must agree that everything was delicious.  The staff of this family owned restaurant  was very warm, friendly and easy to work with.  It was a great experience and we will definitely use them again!  If you want a taste of Italy, I recommend you visit them for dinner or use them to cater your next party.  You won't be disappointed!

detailedReviews.author: andrew powers
detailedReviews.text: Picked this place off a "where rochester eats" thread.. well worth it.. had there version of a garbage plate (landfill plate ) was awesome... Definitely worth the trip

detailedReviews.author: Beverly Overacker
detailedReviews.text: I have never had a bad meal. Food is always hot whether delivered or picked up. We live to eat in and enjoy watching the cooks prepare the food.

detailedReviews.author: G W
detailedReviews.text: Can‚Äôt beat a family run establishment with a great sauce recipe and fresh made dough. Whether you want pizza, a calzone. a sub for lunch or a breakaway night for fishfry you won‚Äôt be disappointed. After trying the competition I‚Äôve been a regular here for over 20 years. That alone speaks volumes.

detailedReviews.author: Barrette Guys
detailedReviews.text: Best wings and Pizza in Rochester area. Kevin and James and entire staff are pros!

detailedReviews.author: Susan Whitfield
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Rochester and the nicest people work there!

detailedReviews.author: Lee Karabinakis
detailedReviews.text: This place is a Fairport staple. Great food, great people!

detailedReviews.author: Bethany Dembroski
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, we love the hot subs too! Kevin (the owner) is super friendly. The make-your-own-pizza for kids is so fun too!

detailedReviews.author: Robin Doyle
detailedReviews.text: I have been getting Perinton pizza for 40 years no matter where we moved to it has always been hot and delicious I have kids grown now and they still get Perinton pizza

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Doyle
detailedReviews.text: Perinton Pizza is the best. I‚Äôve been a regular customer for 40 years; following them through several different locations.

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Stephens (Ben)
detailedReviews.text: We only do take out. Everytime we order, the staff has been very helpful and friendly. In my opinion they have the best pizza in the perinton/Fairport area. Perfect Crust, delicious and flavorful sauce and great topping selections. They bake the pizzas and calzones just long enough to have a great crunch without burning.  They serve later than other pizza places so they can accommodate people who eat late. Their social media is also fun to follow.

detailedReviews.author: Jkandra03
detailedReviews.text: I love these guys! When you think of a hometown pizza place this is it. Their staff is awesome, pizza is fantastic, atmosphere is inviting.  Maybe next they will add pinball machines lol

detailedReviews.author: Brian Stotz
detailedReviews.text: A friend told us about this place. Over the years my wife and I have tried many local pizza places and have had a few suggestions with mixed results, but we were both blown away by our pizzas! Everything from the crust to the sauce to the toppings was the best we had in a long time. Too bad we didn't know about PPE sooner. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

detailedReviews.author: Liz Davis
detailedReviews.text: Kevin and his crew hit it out of the park with his catered food this evening for my basketball end of the season banquet!!! The absolute best chicken French in town!!

detailedReviews.author: Ken Cooper
detailedReviews.text: We were referred here by a friend and have been back EVERY Friday for about a year now.  The food is delicious, consistent, and fresh! The service is 10 Star‚Ä¶or higher!  Thursday rolls around and we‚Äôre drooling and can‚Äôt wait for Friday pizza at Perinton Pizza Emporium!

detailedReviews.author: Craig Chilelli
detailedReviews.text: Perinton Pizza never disappoints! The food and service is always exceptional! Ordered some chicken Riggies for the big game and they were a hit! The pizza is super and definitely check out the whole menu!

detailedReviews.author: Rich Glickman
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza. Cup char pepperoni is the best!  Monday special is the best deal in town.

detailedReviews.author: Lucas Goller
detailedReviews.text: Always a solid pie!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Bliek
detailedReviews.text: My co-workers and I love the food.  Especially the chicken french with garlic mashed potatoes, roasted veggies, garlic knots and the cookies and cannoli's. We've had this twice now and employees can't wait for the next time.  We've also had their pizza and wings several times and never any left by the end of the day.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Grasso
detailedReviews.text: Everyone is always so happy! Obviously a great place to work. And great food too? Winning combination!!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Jasie
detailedReviews.text: Wasn‚Äôt planning on getting calzones until the bogo deal popped up via text.  Changed my plan for the evening!  Two calzones with toppings for under $15!  Left some karma for the friendly employees.  Love Perinton Pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Neil Parry
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was ready a few minutes early and was still hot when I got home. Excellent service

detailedReviews.author: Robert Wegman
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Annmarie Lent
detailedReviews.text:
Loved the TV with the college game while I waited for a couple of slices.
The staff were wonderful.
I have to admit I asked for three slices from a pie in the warming case that looked like it had been sitting a while.
I did ask the girl to add a little more cheese to make it a little more palatable, and she was then obliged with a smile.
She gave me the three slices in a large box and apologized for the awkward presentation.
Sadly, I probably should not have wasted the extra cheese and either gotten a whole fresh pie or none at all.
It was very old, and the crust was super hard.
Great service but the pizza could have been more fresh for sure.

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Roberts
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a bunch of sheet breakfast pizzas for a holiday party at the last minute with a 9:00 a.m. delivery ( before store hours) and they made it happen! Pizza's were a hit, everybody really enjoyed! We will definitely call again for our gatherings! Very reasonable price too.

detailedReviews.author: David Drons
detailedReviews.text: It's definitely a quality pizza, prices are reasonable.

detailedReviews.author: Katie O'Reilly
detailedReviews.text: Always had great food from them until August 30th, when I was given a pizza with multiple hairs baked into the cheese, and overcooked french fries. I was promised my money back and a meal on them, but still have not received anything, and the manager that I talked to was angry that I was complaining about the food. I ended up ordering my family dinner from TK's, which never disappoints. I will never be ordering from Perinton Pizza Emporium ever again, we don't like hairy, overcooked food, or rude workers.

detailedReviews.author: MIke Kelly
detailedReviews.text: We had a Catering order, on time and on point. Excellent food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Clay Bryan
detailedReviews.text: We had catering from Perinton for an event, and it was the best catered food I've ever had. The chicken was juicy and seasoned perfectly, the greens & beans were perfect, and the pasta was great. I wish I lived in the area, but I'm only visiting. Otherwise, my wallet would be regularly out to buy this excellent food.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Kelly
detailedReviews.text: The best spot! The team there is very professional and it shows in the final product. We recently had a catering event and the food was incredible, on time, and everyone was extremely impressed. I cant say enough good things about Kevin and James. They are truly the best in business.

detailedReviews.author: Camille Lavell
detailedReviews.text: Had a 60+ engagement party and perinton pizza catering made our food-absolutely phenomenal! Chicken French, ziti, greens and beans and much more. Everyone was extremely impressed. 10/10 would recommend-especially for a special occasion they arrived early and were happy to accommodate to everything we wanted.

detailedReviews.author: Brandy Bills
detailedReviews.text: Everything was wonderful as always.

detailedReviews.author: Erin Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza- reasonable price on specials!!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Wilcox
detailedReviews.text: My children and I happend to be in the area and wanted pizza and I'm so happy we picked this place.  The staff was so friendly,  the service was fast and it was delicious!!

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Wheeler
detailedReviews.text: Isabel, My gluten free pizza was perfect ! Sauce was delicious! Thank you! Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Laurie Reifsteck
detailedReviews.text: My husband went and picked up our order of a medium pepperoni and cheese pizza and 10 drumettes on 9/11/24. When he got home  they weren‚Äôt all drumettes and pizza wasn‚Äôt cooked as long as I liked ( cheese wasn‚Äôt bubbly) . I called Perinton pizza and Ron drove out and delivered my drumettes and crispy pizza ! Now that‚Äôs pride in their business and great customer service! Thank you so much and I look forward to trying other items on your big menu!

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Carson
detailedReviews.text: A very kind person from PP dropped off a large sheet pizza for the kids at the Perinton Skate Park today. What a kind and generous gift!!

detailedReviews.author: Maureen Glickman
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and wings! Everyone is so friendly. The cup n char pepperoni is tasty!

detailedReviews.author: David Reininger
detailedReviews.text: Always an awesome experience!

detailedReviews.author: Madelyn Benedetto
detailedReviews.text: Everything was good

detailedReviews.author: Greg Lievens
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a thin crust pizza with red sauce, sausage, green pepper, mushroom, onion and tomatoes. Tasted great and fresh and was ready in about 10 minutes.  Staff was very kind and friendly. We sat & ate at one of the picnic tables outside next to growing vegetables pots.  Looked like most of their business is pickup or delivery but they did have tables & chairs inside to eat.  All drinks were bottles to purchase.

detailedReviews.author: Steven Smith
detailedReviews.text: Aggressively mediocre pizza. Frozen wings. Mid sauce. All around meh for me.

detailedReviews.author: Jim Riley
detailedReviews.text: I love their pizza and salads. The buffalo chicken salad is my go-to. Growing up on Buffalo pizza when we moved here we found that we like Perinton pizza the best in Fairport.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Schepisi Fossum
detailedReviews.text: I originally wrote this review after our first time ordering from Perinton Pizza Emporium. The service remains outstanding! We only order from Perinton Pizza. We love the apps, desserts; wings, and pizza! I look forward to ordering pizza on Tuesdays! They run amazing specials. The pizza has become a staple for when our family and friends visit. Their customer service is phenomenal. We have dined in, had take away, and delivery. All forms of service have been wonderful. If we have questions about an order or event, the staff are able to answer and support us. We will continue to order from Perinton Pizza Emporium. Keep up the amazing work!

detailedReviews.author: Binnie Thompson
detailedReviews.text: Order frequently and everything is always delicious!

detailedReviews.author: TakeNote Advertising Specialties
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the area!

detailedReviews.author: Wendy Meares
detailedReviews.text:
Traditional NY Pizza that we crave, it's the Best Pizza around, seriosly.
Great specials.

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Santo
detailedReviews.text: Always service with a smile. The Best Pizza in the Rochester area!

detailedReviews.author: daniel scarazzo
detailedReviews.text: Daughter and her pre school went there for a make your own  pizza activity.  They had a blast and they were so nice with all the little kids. Shout out to you guys. !

detailedReviews.author: Anne Gohlke
detailedReviews.text: I've ordered pizza from Perinton Pizza for years and they have always been excellent and very prompt.  So tonight I was surprised when my pizza still hasn't arrived after half hour after the approximate delivery time.  Turns out the workers finishing up working at my house accepted my order and kept it!  Perinton Pizza promptly made and sent out a replacement order to us.  Thank you Perinton Pizza!  Our dinner was, as always, excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Byer
detailedReviews.text: Great service and great food!!

detailedReviews.author: Samuel Lovejoy
detailedReviews.text: This place is top notch. From the food, to the  customer service, they take care of their customers. I ordered ahead for the Super Bowl and one of my two pizzas was delivered incorrectly. After trying to flag down the delivery person to let her know, I called the shop. They were beyond kind and immediately rectified the situation. Within 15 minutes I had a replacement pizza. While it was a simple mixup, they took the time to fix it on the busiest night of the year. If I could give them more than 5 stars, I would!

detailedReviews.author: Roman Synowski
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pizza for delivery. Delivery was on time and the driver was very professional. Pizza was delivered hot and just as ordered. Overall great experience.

detailedReviews.author: Stacey VanDenburgh
detailedReviews.text: Simply the best pizza in our area! Thin, delicious crust, gooey cheese and wonderful toppings. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Mangini
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Fairport

detailedReviews.author: Arthur Vogel
detailedReviews.text: Very reasonablely priced good food quality

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Callahan
detailedReviews.text: Kevin is fantastic! He's super friendly all the time and makes awesome accommodations for food allergies. This is definitely my new favorite Pizza place!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Our go-to local pizzeria, always! Fantastic pizza and wings, and a genuinely kind/caring owner. He is always giving back to the community. Get their pizza, you will be thankful you did!

detailedReviews.author: Arend M
detailedReviews.text: If you‚Äôre craving NY up state pizza this is the place. Simply fantastic pizza and excellent wings. Service was efficient and friendly. The prices are reasonable as well.

detailedReviews.author: Paul inMass
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and reliable service! We‚Äôve been getting our pizza and wings for 15 years and always enjoy the consistently superb food. You can go wrong with the best!

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Kovacsiss
detailedReviews.text: Perinton Pizza‚Äôs team is fantastic and very friendly. Food is always great and the new rewards are excellent also. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Edward J Durkin
detailedReviews.text: Great food.   Always perfect.

detailedReviews.author: Erin Colling
detailedReviews.text: We tried Perinton Pizza for the first time a couple of weeks ago and it was fantastic! Such a great difference from our usual spots. The pizza was great and the hand dipped boneless wings were phenomenal. This will be our new ‚Äògo to‚Äô!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Danks
detailedReviews.text: Haven‚Äôt eaten a pizza from here since school started(crazy schedules) but took advantage of their Tues. special today.  Our whole family has been oohing & awing over how delicious , fresh & hot their pizzas are!  It is worth the extra 8-10 min drive if you‚Äôre from Victor or the other side of Farmington!  And their taco pizza‚Ä¶BEST I‚ÄôVE EVER HAD!!  Our fam‚Äôs favorite!  Never ever had a disappointing pizza from here!!

detailedReviews.author: Carol Glaess
detailedReviews.text: Our go to spot for good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Adam R Traub
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Knapp
detailedReviews.text: Just had a small pepperoni and mushroom pizza cooked perfectly  supper friendly staff never disappoint

detailedReviews.author: Dave Pallo
detailedReviews.text: There are many choices for pizza in Perinton, but Perinton Pizza gets it right for us every time! Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Celentano
detailedReviews.text: Love the choices. The amount of toppings. Convenient!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Engert
detailedReviews.text:
Family owned . Always pleasant and professional. They take pride in what they make and sell . Reasonable pricing .
They do a lot for the kids . Don‚Äôt forget to order the tiramisu with your order . YUM

detailedReviews.author: Trice Coushaine
detailedReviews.text: ‚Ä¶ in from out of town and wanted to support a small business vs the giant chain grocery store. We decided to try Perinton Pizza Emporium. The pizza was great, thin crust done to perfection, thin saut√©ed/ partially carmelized onions and pepperoni topped the pizza. The sauce was phenomenal. Super friendly people were running the place. We‚Äôll be back again when I‚Äôm up visiting.

detailedReviews.author: Sharayah Werner
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food, speedy service, and great staff! Everything here is super delicious and decently priced. They are always polite and friendly and quick to solve any problems on the rare occasion there is one!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the outstanding customer service and friendly staff, making it a key highlight of their dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza is frequently described as the best in Rochester, with a unique sauce and fresh-made dough that customers love. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant's catering services receive high praise for events, with customers noting the delicious food and seamless experience. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent food quality and freshness (e.g., old pizza, hair in food, overcooked fries) - review management can address this concern
Negative customer service experience (e.g., rude manager, unresolved refund issue) - review management can address this concern
Competition from other local restaurants (e.g., customers choosing TK's over Perinton Pizza Emporium) - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Jeremy Yoder
positive.text: Ordered pizza and wings for dinner. Both were phenomenal! Highly recommend.

positive.author: Mary Christopher
positive.text: Our favorite pizzeria!!! They are consistent‚Ä¶. We‚Äôve never had a bad pizza!

positive.author: roman napora
positive.text: Great pizza, consistent, I called and they added me to their delivery area, wish I did it sooner!!! Great food

neutral.author: Annmarie Lent
neutral.text:
Loved the TV with the college game while I waited for a couple of slices.
The staff were wonderful.
I have to admit I asked for three slices from a pie in the warming case that looked like it had been sitting a while.
I did ask the girl to add a little more cheese to make it a little more palatable, and she was then obliged with a smile.
She gave me the three slices in a large box and apologized for the awkward presentation.
Sadly, I probably should not have wasted the extra cheese and either gotten a whole fresh pie or none at all.
It was very old, and the crust was super hard.
Great service but the pizza could have been more fresh for sure.

negative.author: Katie O'Reilly
negative.text: Always had great food from them until August 30th, when I was given a pizza with multiple hairs baked into the cheese, and overcooked french fries. I was promised my money back and a meal on them, but still have not received anything, and the manager that I talked to was angry that I was complaining about the food. I ended up ordering my family dinner from TK's, which never disappoints. I will never be ordering from Perinton Pizza Emporium ever again, we don't like hairy, overcooked food, or rude workers.

negative.author: Steven Smith
negative.text: Aggressively mediocre pizza. Frozen wings. Mid sauce. All around meh for me.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
